scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd shared && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend -- --coverage && npm run test:backend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
